Define Documentation

#define ZGP_RXD_REPORT_DESC_MASK_SIZE
Value:
(ZGP_MAX_NO_OF_REPORTS/8 + \
                                      (ZGP_MAX_NO_OF_REPORTS % 8 ? 1 : 0))
